page.title: 04EDUCATION IN OUR GRID
page.content: part 2 MANOD PRIMARY SCHOOL,BL. FFESTINIOG 19 pupils live on the MERIONETH DISTRICT COUNCIL PENYGWNDWN HOUSING ESTATE. 12 FATHERS WORK AT THE TRAWSFYNYDD NUCLEAR POWER STATION.24 fathers travel from the town to work. 84 pupils were born in the Ffestiniog area and l7 moved from other areas. 12 fathers are self-employed. SCHOOL VISITS,l985: Segontium Roman Camp Site,Caernarfon and the Llanberis Quarry Museum. Some pupils competed in the Urdd Regional eisteddfod and the School netball team got through to the finals in Merionethshire,Gwynedd. The annual MISS BRYMER MEMORIAL PRIZE was awarded to CLAUDINE WILLIAMS,177,Manod Rd. ll year old CLAUDINE was voted to receive the Â£4 prize for her gentle,kindly nature by fellow-pupils.
